org.interreg.docexplore.manuscript
Class MetaData

java.lang.Object
  org.interreg.docexplore.manuscript.ManuscriptObject
      org.interreg.docexplore.manuscript.AnnotatedObject
          org.interreg.docexplore.manuscript.MetaData
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<ManuscriptObject>
public class MetaData
extends AnnotatedObject

Class representing annotations associated with an AnnotatedObject. An annotation is characterized by a key MetaDataKey, a type and a value. A type is a three letter String. Built-in types are "txt" and "img". Other types can be added through plugins.

Author:
Alexander Burnett

getFile

public java.io.File getFile()
                     throws DataLinkException
If the underlying ManuscriptLink is file system based, returns the file representing this annotation.

Returns:
The file representing this annotation or null if there is none.
Throws:
DataLinkException

search

public static ResultBuffer<MetaData> search(ManuscriptLink link,
                                            java.util.List<Pair<MetaDataKey,java.lang.String>> criteria,
                                            boolean disjoint,
                                            double relevance)
                                     throws DataLinkException
Search a ManuscriptLink for annotations matching textual criteria.

Parameters:
link - The link to search.
criteria - A list of criteria. Each pair indicates a MetaDataKey and a search term.
disjoint - If set to true, at least one criterion must be met to create a match. Otherwise, all criteria must be met.
relevance - Relevance threshold, between 0 to 1.
Returns:
A buffer containing search matches.
Throws:
DataLinkException
